TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It happens that cheez is a new deadly poison.

I wish for less mudkipz

Granted. I herd u liek bulbasores.

I wish for a timepiece.

Granted. It tells time in martian days.

Iwishnobodyusedthespacekeyanymore.

Granted;thespacekeystaketheirrevengeforourneglectingoftheirrights.Everyonewhousedaspacekeyandnolongerdoesiskilledintheensuingwar.

I wish the signature limit was back to its unlimited former self.

Granted user's sigs are so big they take up a whole page

I wish i wasn't tempted to download hyper edit when ever i run out of fuel

Granted. Instead you use the debug menu.

I wish I got a fully functioning, retail version of the Xbox One, with games for it.

Granted, but while you're installing it, some guy comes and steals your television, making the whole thing worthless.

My wish is for a brand new 16" telescope.

Granted, but some guy comes along and superglues and duct tapes it to the floor in a windowless room.

I wish that the granter of this wish can't make a wish of their own

Granted. However, the Universal Law and Rights Enforcement Committee takes notice of this case and decides to revoke all effects of your wish, as they believe everyone is entitled to their wishes. Following the overruling of your wish, you're thrown into a star that is going supernova as punishment for your cruelty.

I wish that it was less light-polluted and cloudy around here at night.

Granted, but now it's vile smog during the day instead

I wish NASA would send a mission to Mun, err, the Moon again

Granted, but they build a prison cell there to keep you there for eternity.

I wish I had a cat.

Granted, it's Grumpy Cat

I wish I had a thing to wish for...

Granted. It's a stonefish you have to step on.

I wish for a loyal stonefish minion to kill all those I don't like with pain.

Granted, but you can't see it and step on it...

I wish that stonefishes were red.

Granted, but the freak mutation that made them red also allowed them to survive on land. Within months, thousands die because they stepped on the fish while texting, playing games in the park or even taking a brisk jog.

As the death tolls rise, stonefish begin reproducing in the sewers, and soon, there is a massive plague of the nasty buggers, all crawling through the grass and searching for invertebrates.

While the population is eventually controlled, a few fish remain in the sewers. They gradually multiply until tens of thousands burst out of manholes and, in some cases, toilets. This outburst kills hundreds more. The population is again controlled, but the same thing happens again several years later. And again. And again.

Eventually, many move out of near-costal cities. This mass migration devastates costal infrastructure and costs billions, but the stonefish creep further and further inland.

Stonefish-proof boots become common, and people learn to avoid the fish. ("Step on Red, You'll be Dead!") Life become almost normal for a time...

and then this land survival trait spreads to moray eels.

Sorry if that was a little dark.

I wish that I could see the Milky Way from where I live...

granted. the shift in the earth's alignment causes thousands to die due to weather, temperature, and such.

I wish it was christmas already!

Granted, but your family brutally murders you because they want your presents for themselves.

I wish people would not make such a big thing of Christmas sometimes...

Granted, now they're addicted to the Thanksgiving.

I wish I could draw.

Granted, but you can never find your markers.

I wish for a mouse. (As in computer mouse)

Granted. It's broken. And it kills you.

I wish that there were less threads that eventually get derailed by the, um, 5 or 6 of us posting you know what.

Granted, they derail over something else.

I wish for a TARDIS.

Granted. The forums are now gone

I wish that I could buy my computer parts today

Granted. Of course, the price is jacked up by 100 times

I wish for a Canadian soda

Granted, but it tastes of free pharmaceuticals.

I wish the world would accept/embrace furries.

Granted. They embrace them. They embrace them by killing them, skinning them, and then wearing their skin like the furries did animals

Iwishforspacebar
